pci_project_new_payment_register_explain: You need to register a payment method to validate your identity.  You will not be debited and nothing will be withdrawn until you consume resources.
pci_project_new_payment_register_info_cr: You will be redirected to our service provider's secure interface to save a new bank card. A small amount is deducted from your bank account to confirm your card's validity, and verify that your details have been entered correctly. Nothing will be charged to your account.
pci_project_new_payment_register_info_pa: By clicking on ‘Create my project’, you will be redirected to the PayPal secure interface to register your account.
pci_project_new_payment_register_info_ba: By clicking "Add", you will be redirected to the ‘My payment methods’ section of the OVHcloud Control Panel.
pci_project_new_payment_register_warning: Your bank account will be approved within 24 to 48 hours of receiving your debit authorization, which must be returned by mail. You can then recreate a Public Cloud project.
